problem.p: Try to guess the demographics of the OMSCS program! (OMSCS demographics are based on the 400 students in CS7637: Knowledge-Based AI in Summer 2015)
What percentage of OMSCS students lived in the United States immediately before they began their Master's Degree?

choicegroup.label: What percentage of OMSCS students lived in the United States immediately before they began their Master's Degree?
choicegroup.choice: 13% Way too low! In fact, that's the percentage of OMSCS students that do *not* live in the United States.
32% You're right!... about the on-campus program. Only 32% of on-campus students lived in the United States before they started their Master's Degree.
68% Not quite! 68% of on-campus students did not live in the United States before beginning their Master's Degree.
87% That's right! The online program is largely domestic, which surprised us at first.

div.p: 87% of OMSCS students lived in the United States before beginning their Master's Degree. While the program draws a big international audience in terms of raw numbers (approximately 500 international students), the domestic students dominate in terms of percentages.
